name: Breakline (itch)
description:
Breakline is a 2D rogue lite in pixelart where you play 3 characters who can teleport themselve in different universe !

Different ennemies in each world and bosses will make you shake !... At least if you're able to clear all room without dying ! But don't worry too much, coins and exp wiil help you upgrade your equipements and abilities.

3 characters : the engineer, the rogue and the berserk who each got an unique weapon, gun and abilitie

==========

This game was made by a group of 8 in 2 months  as a school project. Our group is called "Dimensional Scum"

Programmers :

 - Elioth Bénard
 - Anthony Contreras
 - Vincent Debuissy
 - François Duprez
 - Quentin Ferragu

Graphic artists :

 - Simon Garnier
 - Hugo Goince
 - William Moiriat
 - Théo Saragas

Musics :

 - Sons Of Amon

Our school, CREAJEUX
